Name: Le Latin
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
History: The French Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Franck Dedieu, Redwood, Lyon.
Nutrition: One serving of Le Latin contains 151 calories
